rules_text:
Fathom {5}{G}{G} [i](If you cast this by sacrificing a creature or Vehicle and paying the fathom cost reduced by that permanent’s mana value, put this onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves or loses targets.)[/i]
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
